tuimbe aleluya. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amezaliwa (chah!) pangoni
Bethlehemu (chah!).
Ndiye Mwokozi (chah!)
wetu wa dunia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Leo tufurahi,
Masiya kazaliwa.
Ametuletea,
ukombozi wetu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ametukomboa,
kutoka dhambini.
Hivyo tuna
haki kushangilia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Malaika Mbinguni,
pia wanaimba.
Nyimbo nzuri sana,
pia za kupendeza.
